text: Stuart Stone (born Stuart Eisenstein) is a Canadian film, television, and voice actor as well as a producer of television, film and music. He is best known for his roles as Ronald Fisher in the 2001 cult film, Donnie Darko, and Ralphie Tennelli on The Magic School Bus animated television series from 1994 to 1997. Stone has also toured as a comedian and rapper. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 births Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Living people Category:Canadian child actors Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Musicians from Ontario Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian rappers
title: Stuart Stone
